title: Collada files do not follow collada specification, id attributes are not unique

content.raw:
According to the collada specification (http://www.khronos.org/files/collada_schema_1_4) id attributes are unique within the document

<xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID">
						<xs:annotation>
							<xs:documentation>
							The id attribute is a text string containing the unique identifier of this element. This value 
							must be unique within the instance document. Optional attribute.
							</xs:documentation>
						</xs:annotation>
					</xs:attribute>

Our collada importer assumes this behavior holds and cannot load the models if this is not the case. We changed the DAE files to correspond to the spec and they work fine then. I've attached the changed files.
